attributes.action: tax concessions for small community groups
attributes.additional_details: tax concessions for small community groups would help local communities to stay stronger and work better.encourage local and national businesses to support small community groups to improve areas with out having to be a registered Charity. I run a community group that has been active for 13 years but now if we want to keep going we are told we need to become a registered charity, even though we have a national and world wide company that wants to support us but are unable until we become registered charity. please fix it so all small community groups can benefit with tax concessions and company support.
